entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Harbour 08:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: 4.4°C
Pressure: 99.8 kPa
Humidity: 74 %
Dewpoint: 0.2°C
Wind: W 31 km/h gust 47 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait this morning and early this afternoon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries in the morning. A few rain showers and wet flurries beginning late in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
